lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dutch brewer Heineken NV said it hoped to maintain for a number of years a similar earnings growth to the 7.5 pct increase in net profit achieved in 1986, despite continuing investments in a reorganization program and efforts to extend world penetration.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: We have the beer, but distribution and sales is the important point," van Schaik said, adding that since the ruling Heineken had been inundated by German traders seeking joint ventures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Heineken is urging farmers to grow the traditional raw materials, but Coebergh noted that banana and palm beer were popular in Rwanda .
